Package hippodrome

Class GeneralInformationRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository

  • public class GeneralInformationRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia. This item allows the entities playing at an hippodrome to collect information about the various statuses and snapshots all the instants while something is happening.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.lang.String brokerStatus
      Last taken snapshot of the Broker entity.
      private static int currentRaceDistance
      Last taken snapshot of the current race distance of track.
      private static genclass.TextFile file
      File object file from the external class TextFile which allows us to control a file as IO for the log.
      private static java.lang.String filename
      Name of the file where the log is to be saved.
      private static HorseJockey[] horseJockeys
      Last taken snapshot of the pairs Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey) entities.
      private static int raceNumber
      Last taken snapshot of the race number.
      private static Spectator[] spectators
      Last taken snapshot of the Spectator entity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GeneralInformationRepository​()
      Creates a General Repository of Information which saves a snapshot of all instants of time throughout a horse run game.

    • Method Detail

      • giveFileAName

        private static void giveFileAName​()
        Gives a name to the logging file. This name is constructed with the application name (horse-run) followed by the UNIX timestamp of when this method is executed and the extension .log.

      • printHeaders

        private static void printHeaders​()
                          throws InaccessibleFileException
        Print the headers of the log files.
        Throws:
        InaccessibleFileException - if the file does not grant any permission for the current user to be written on. The same behavior could occur if the directory where this file resides cannot be written by the current user.

      • newSnapshot

        public static void newSnapshot​()
        Adds a new snapshot of the race to log it.

      • printEntitiesLine

        private static void printEntitiesLine​()
        Makes a snapshot of the entities at a given time.

      • printRaceLine

        private static void printRaceLine​()
        Makes a snapshot of the race at a given time.
